author: stsp
msg: (combine_with_lastrange): Indent the large switch statement correctly.

author: stsp
msg: Don't invoke quicksort unnecessarily when combining mergeinfo rangelists.
This speeds up --reintegrate merges, especially the pathological case
Subject: O(n**3) behaviour in reintegrate merge
(combine_with_lastrange): If adding a new range element which is larger
than the last element in the range, the list is already sorted and we
don't need to run qsort(). This approach works because the existing
rangelist is assumed to be sorted (or empty). And there is no need to
sort the list if we haven't even changed it, either (duh!).
